record.id: name="New Workplace Employee Bundle" and syslanguage="en"
record.name: New Workplace Employee Bundle
record.description: Setup up a new employee with workplace equipment and accounts. This includes a fully provisioned Desktop Bundle, network connectivity, and accounts to primary communication and security services.
record.detailedDescription: Setup up a new employee with workplace equipment and accounts. This includes a fully provisioned Desktop Bundle, network connectivity, and accounts to primary communication and security services.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Standard Desktop Bundle</label><label id="opt2">(1) LAN Connection Port</label><label id="opt3">(1) PC Backup</label><label id="opt4">(1) Employee Mailbox</label></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Standard Desktop Bundle</label><label id="opt2">(1) LAN Connection Port</label><label id="opt3">(1) PC Backup</label><label id="opt4">(1) Employee Mailbox</label></form>
